Description: Return to Work Programs When experienced professionals take a career break, our Return to Work initiative is an excellent opportunity to re-engage. At Morgan Stanley, we value the unique perspectives and diverse experiences that the program participants bring to the Firm. We have seen some of our best and brightest talent come through this program and we look forward to continuing to support those re-entering the workforce. Mandell Crawley, Chief Human Resources Officer Company profile Morgan Stanley is a leading global financial services firm providing a wide range of investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. The Firm's employees serve clients worldwide including corporations, governments and individuals from more than 700 offices in 42 countries. As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. Together, we share a common set of values rooted in integrity, excellence and strong team ethic. Morgan Stanley can provide a superior foundation for building a professional career - a place for people to learn, to achieve and grow. A philosophy that balances personal lifestyles, perspectives and needs is an important part of our culture. Morgan Stanley's Return to Work program is an opportunity for professionals to re-enter the workforce. Launched in India in 2015, Return to Work is a paid 16-week internship program, in which participants are placed in roles based on their skills and interests, working with colleagues and senior leaders throughout the firm. You will receive continuous training, mentorship and professional development to help you learn new skills, build relationships and gain new on-the-job experiences. Upon completion of the internship, participants may receive an offer of employment. Internship opportunities exist within multiple divisions across the firm in Mumbai and Bengaluru. Placements are based on applicants skills, experience and interests, with internship opportunities in these business units: Human Resources Finance Human Resources Shared Services Operation Investment Management Fixed Income Technology (Java Developer , .Net , Data Analyst , C++ , Python, Automation testing , Business Analyst , Devops , SDET , Mainframe Developer , Azure , AWS , Cyber Security ) Application Deadline ends on 30th November 2023 Internship Program Dates 4th March 2024 21st June 2024Job Details
